title: FS: 1890 Harper's Weekly Woodcuts - 4 HoFers (Anson, etc.)
author: Woundedduck

posts.post_title: FS: 1890 Harper's Weekly Woodcuts - 4 HoFers (Anson, etc.)
posts.post_content:
I'm asking for SOLD for these 4 Woodcuts from the May 3, 1890 Harper's Weekly which includes delivery.  All are hand cut but still have great eye appeal.  This is the exact price that I paid for them a few months ago from the auction section on these forums.  Paypal preferred, gift not required.  I recently picked up several other full page Harper's Weekly prints and no longer need these 4.  The Anson measures ~ 2.5" x 3" and the other 3 measure ~ 2.5" x 4" .  

[IMG]http://i241.photobucket.com/albums/ff297/woundedduck/PC%20vintage%20NFT/1.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i241.photobucket.com/albums/ff297/woundedduck/PC%20vintage%20NFT/3.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i241.photobucket.com/albums/ff297/woundedduck/PC%20vintage%20NFT/4.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i241.photobucket.com/albums/ff297/woundedduck/PC%20vintage%20NFT/2.jpg[/IMG]

Hello,

Are the woodcuts still available?

Harvey
